title: (2 Day notice) MrDuckensteins 1v1 Tourney (players drawn just before the start 5pm QLD time(30/3/15)

embed.description: OCE -HD- Plat 2 Grinding Back to Dia! #MrDuckenstein SNAPCHAT

body:
Hey guys just letting everyone know ill be hosting another 1v1 Tourney on Monday the 30th of March at 5pm QLD time

All games are streamed on my channel, so be sure to pop in to watch your friends play - if they get in :)
All players are randomly selected from the viewer list moments before the tourney starts (everyone has equal chance to get in)

**Winner gets $25 RP**
**Second gets $10 RP **

During the stream (which starts at 4pm QLD time) there will be 3x$10 rp cards given away during the stream
So even if you dont get a chance to play in the tourney you can still win some rp!

(Please read below the stream under the "Duckyy bot" tab if you have not used in stream currency to enter in raffles/giveaways)

**HOW TO ENTER TOURNEY**
Everyone who wishes to enter the tourney will be asked to join in **a raffle on stream,**   
Everyone will be able to enter 1 ticket in the raffle,
this makes sure the chance to win is even, from there ill draw 8 people (must be there and respond to be entered, if afk for 3mins after name call re-roll will happen) and with these 8 people we will start the tourney!

**Rules**
Map- Rift
style- 1v1
Backing- Allowed
Entereing Brush- No
Lane- Middle
(If i have left anything out or if your unsure on something please let me know)

**How to Win**
1. 100 cs
2. First Blood
3. First Tower


Follow my social media and stream to see when we go live! (or just hear about our awesome events/giveaways)
**Snapchat** -  Mrduckenstein  
**Facebook** -  facebook.com/MrDuckenstein
**Twitch** -  twitch.tv/mrduckenstein



Cant wait to see you guys there!
Duckyy! {{champion:34}}

replies.body:
This is awesome!
So going to be there
Dont forget to upvote/comment to help get the word out guys! <3 (link was also shared to streams fb so feel free to share that also){{summoner:30}}
cant wait, hopefully im awake to help shoutcast xD
what time will this be for melb... im lazy :D
Thanks for coming on and playing guys GRATS to the winners :D and i hope everyone had fun!

I'm ready with that ban hammer :D for anyone who decides to cause trouble
still {{summoner:11}} the {{summoner:31}}
